page.title: 12A TYPICAL WEEK FOR A FAMILY
page.content: {MONDAY TO FRIDAY} Get up between 7 & 8.30.Make coffee. Give children breakfast.Daughter feeds chickens and takes dog for a walk. 08.50 Children go to school by car. Three families take turns to ferry children to and from school daily. 15.40 Children home.Family tea between 17.00 & 18.00.Important part of day. 19.30 - 20.00. Children go to bed. Son has story,daughter reads or something quiet in her room until 21.00.Mum and Dad in bed 22.30-23.30 {LEISURE AND RECREATION} Mother. Reading,folk-singing,gardening,party political worker. Father.Folk musician,party political worker Daughter(10)Reading,nature,music, Brownies. Son(6)Plays with toys,rides BMX bike.
